001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagInstance;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.Collection;
012import java.util.function.Predicate;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017public final class FlagInstanceFilter {
018  private FlagInstanceFilter() {
019    // disable construction
020  }
021
022  @NonNull
023  public static Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> filterFlags(
024      @NonNull Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> flags,
025      IFlagInstance jsonKeyFlag) {
026    Predicate<IFlagInstance> filter = null;
027
028    // determine if we need to filter a JSON key
029    if (jsonKeyFlag != null) {
030      filter = filterFlag(jsonKeyFlag);
031    }
032    return applyFilter(flags, filter);
033  }
034
035  @NonNull
036  public static Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> filterFlags(
037      @NonNull Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> flags,
038      IFlagInstance jsonKeyFlag,
039      IFlagInstance jsonValueKeyFlag) {
040    Predicate<IFlagInstance> filter = null;
041
042    // determine if we need to filter a JSON key
043    if (jsonKeyFlag != null) {
044      filter = filterFlag(jsonKeyFlag);
045    }
046
047    // determine if we need to filter a JSON value key
048    if (jsonValueKeyFlag != null) {
049      Predicate<IFlagInstance> jsonValueKeyFilter
050          = filterFlag(jsonValueKeyFlag);
051      if (filter == null) {
052        filter = jsonValueKeyFilter;
053      } else {
054        filter = filter.and(jsonValueKeyFilter);
055      }
056    }
057
058    return applyFilter(flags, filter);
059  }
060
061  @NonNull
062  private static Predicate<IFlagInstance>
063      filterFlag(@NonNull IFlagInstance flagToFilter) {
064    return flag -> !flagToFilter.equals(flag);
065  }
066
067  @NonNull
068  private static Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> applyFilter(
069      @NonNull Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> flags,
070      Predicate<IFlagInstance> filter) {
071    Collection<? extends IFlagInstance> retval;
072    if (filter == null) {
073      retval = flags;
074    } else {
075      retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(flags.stream()
076          .filter(filter)
077          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
078    }
079    return retval;
080  }
081}
